Preconditions: User must have a registered email address associated with the online banking account.
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to the online banking login page.

Test Case ID: 3. Enter the registered email address in the provided field.
5. Check the email inbox for the password reset email.
Test Case Name: The user receives an email with a password reset link.

Preconditions: User must have received a password reset email.
Test Steps: 1. Click on the password reset link in the email.

Test Case ID: 3. Attempt to use the link again.
Test Case Name: The user receives a message indicating that the link has expired.

Preconditions: User must have received a password reset email and clicked the link.
Test Steps: 1. Click on the password reset link in the email.

Test Case ID: 2. Enter a new password in the provided field.

Test Case Name: The user is redirected to the login page with a success message indicating the password has been reset.
Verify Password Reset with Invalid Email
Preconditions: User must be on the password reset page.
Test Steps: 1. Enter an unregistered email address in the password reset field.

Test Case Name: The user receives an error message indicating that the email address is not associated with any account.
Verify Password Reset with Mismatched Passwords
Preconditions: User must have received a password reset email and clicked the link.
Test Steps: 1. Click on the password reset link in the email.

Test Case ID: 2. Enter a new password in the first field.
3. Enter a different password in the confirmation field.

Test Case Name: The user receives an error message indicating that the passwords do not match.
